name: Rollerball (itch)
description:
Simple roll the ball game. Collect the flags - avoid the shield and exit through the tower...

Beat the game and experience a time travel flight!

Good luck! #kenneyjam

Experience time change when You collect points, and move backwards when You enter the trap!

TIPS! 

  1. In case you run into any problem press 'R' to restart the game - and please let me know what kind of problems you experience :)
  2. To avoid the ball getting stuck on start, try tilting the board before it hits...
